markdown:
| icon              = Poe2 breastplate armor DoC icon.png
| description       = The construct known as the Devil of Caroc eventually met her fate at the hands of the villagers of Maiden Falls, who tore her limb from limb. It seems that at least one industrious smith saw some use for her remains. This bronze breastplate was forged from the Devil’s chest piece, brass buckles, and rivets from her various clockwork mechanisms. While her soul has doubtless departed, the remains are not wholly inanimate. The metal, no longer a prison for the soul, nevertheless seems to have been infused with life force and retains some power.
| added_in          = poe2
| equipment_slot    = Armor
| armor_type        = Breastplate
| armor_category    = Medium armor
| requirements      = 
| is_soulbound      = no
| is_unique         = yes
| value             = 5840
| shop_value        = 29200
| recovery_speed    = +35%
| dr_base           = 11
| dr_crush          = 
| dr_pierce         = 
| dr_slash          = 9
| dr_burn           = 
| dr_corrode        = 
| dr_freeze         = 
| dr_shock          = 9
| armor_bonuses     = 
| curr_enchantments = Legendary armor (Deadfire){{!}}Legendary;Articulated;Soul Fragment
| poss_enchantments = 
| rel_quests        = 
| rel_items         = 
| rel_abilities     = 
| rel_talents       = 
| internalname      = Breastplate_Armor_U_Devil_of_Caroc_Breastplate
| guid              = 1a2a2118-230c-4538-936a-0f8f43daeb83
| location          = * If [Devil of Caroc](/devilOfCaroc/) spared [Harmke](/harmke/) in the imported {{poe1}} save, it is available for purchase in [Marihi](/marihi/)'s shop in Periki's Overlook.
}}
'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a {{lc:Breastplate}} in {{poe2}}.

{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}
